sqlMap.update: UPDATE SKT_TOMS SET assetStatCd=#HwStatCode#, assetStatNm=#HwStatName#, modelNm=#ModelName#, mnftNm=#VendorName#, svcDomainNo=#svcL1Code#, svcDomainNm=#svcL1Name#, svcNo=#svcL2Code#, svcNm=#svcL2Name#, bpInfraUserId=#BsnsPersonEmpNo#, bpInfraUserNm=#BsnsPersonEmpNm#, bpAppUserId=#DevPersonEmpNo#, bpAppUserNm=#DevPersonEmpNm#, sktInfraUserId=#InfraPersonEmpNo#, sktInfraUserNm=#InfraPersonEmpNm#, mainIpAddr=#Ip#, hostNm=#hostName#, osVer=#osVer#, regdate=NOW() WHERE (mainIpAddr=#Ip# OR hostNm=#hostName#)
UPDATE PI_TARGET_USER T LEFT OUTER JOIN PI_AP_SERVER AP ON T.AP_NO = AP.AP_NO AND AP.IS_SERVER = 1 SET SERVICE_NM = #svcNm# WHERE TARGET_ID = #target_id#
UPDATE PI_TARGET_USER T LEFT OUTER JOIN PI_AP_SERVER AP ON T.AP_NO = AP.AP_NO AND AP.IS_SERVER = 1 SET INFRA_MANAGER = #bpInfraUserId# WHERE TARGET_ID = #target_id# AND INFRAUSERFLAG IS NULL
UPDATE PI_TARGET_USER T LEFT OUTER JOIN PI_AP_SERVER AP ON T.AP_NO = AP.AP_NO AND AP.IS_SERVER = 1 SET SERVICE_USER = #bpAppUserId# WHERE TARGET_ID = #target_id# AND SERVICEUSERFLAG IS NULL
UPDATE PI_TARGET_USER T LEFT OUTER JOIN PI_AP_SERVER AP ON T.AP_NO = AP.AP_NO AND AP.IS_SERVER = 1 SET USER_NO = #sktInfraUserId# WHERE TARGET_ID = #target_id# AND USERFLAG IS NULL
